categories: Category:Battles of the Jedi Civil War

nodes.text: Battle of the Gizer system  (Jedi Civil War)

A battle of the Jedi Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and Darth Revan's Sith Empire was fought in the Gizer system. The Sith emerged as the victors. The planet was held by the Sith at the height of their territorial expansion.
The battle was referenced in The Essential Atlas. An exact date is not provided for the battle, and it only illustrates the battle on the galactic map.
